titles.title: SAVE Act
Safe Authorization for Vaccines during Emergencies Act
Safe Authorization for Vaccines during Emergencies Act
SAVE Act
SAVE Act
A bill to provide for transparency in emergency use authorization of vaccine products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
